Summary: flying object in the sky was moving slowly as conducting reconnaissance, finally moved at high speed and lost sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home when a friend called me to take out my binoculars to see a strange object in the sky. I thought it was more convenient to take my camera Nikon Coolpix P100 and reach the scene immediately. I realized that the object was producing reflections from sunlight and I guess was due to the material of the object surface. Just locate the eye achieves fails to know that as I had but seemed to be moving slowly. Active my camera and place it fails to take a branch of a tree reference and reach him. Set the maximum zoom to and after several attempts to achieve some are quite sharp and also some short videos. Finally the object is moved at high speed in a straight line and all witnesses were out of sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Callao
This sighting has never been favorited.
